data.name: kstidWordListWindowCaption
data.comment: word list window caption for non search results. Parameter 0 is langauge name, parameter 1 is for the number of records in the list

data.name: kstidVowChartHTMLChartType
data.comment: Written to the charttype attribute in HTML exported output

data.name: kstidSavedChartNameAlreadyExistsMsg
data.value: There is already a saved chart with the name "{0}".

data.name: kstidXYChartFillChartMsg
data.value: You must first choose "Fill Chart" before seeing search results.

data.name: kstidConChartHTMLChartType
data.comment: Written to the charttype attribute in HTML exported output

data.name: kstidMainWindowCaption
data.comment: Parameter 0 is project name; parameter 1 is application name (i.e. Phonology Assistant)

data.name: kstidPAXMLExportCaptionSFD
data.comment: Caption for save file dialog for PA XML export

data.name: kstidDataCorpusHTMLFileName
data.comment: Default name for the HTML export file for HTML output of a data corpus view. The user may change this on the save file dialog.

data.name: kstidConfirmSavedChartRemoval
data.value: Are you sure you want to remove the saved chart?

data.name: kstidConChartHTMLFileName
data.comment: Default name for the HTML export file for HTML output of a consonant chart. The user may change this on the save file dialog.

data.value: Would you like to load the '{0}' project?
data.comment: Question asked of user after they create a new PA project.

data.name: kstidDataCorpusHTMLChartType
data.comment: Written to the charttype attribute in HTML exported output

data.comment: word list window caption for search results. Parameter 0 is for the number of records in the list

data.comment: Default name for the HTML export file for HTML output of a vowel chart. The user may change this on the save file dialog.

data.name: kstidUnAppliedPhoneInventoryChangesMsg
data.value: There are unapplied changes in Phone Inventory view. Would you like to save the changes?

data.comment: First parameter is language name, second is XY chart name

data.comment: Format for name of copied class. First parameter is the copied class name and second is a two digit number to make the name unique.

data.name: kstidInvalidToolboxSortFieldSpecified

data.comment: Caption for project settings dialog when project is not new.

data.comment: Heading for column in undefined phonetic chars. dialog

data.name: kstidRestoreDefaultFeatureMsg
data.value: Are you sure you want to restore the default feature names and default character features definitions? This operation cannot be undone.
data.comment: This message is displayed when the user chooses to restore the default articulatory or binary features.

data.name: kstidSampleInput
data.comment: Used in the mappings dialog

data.name: kstidSearchingForFwDatabasesMsg
data.comment: Message displayed in the dialog for choosing an FW data source when the computer is searching the specified computer for FW databases.

data.name: kstidSetRTFEditorOFDlgTitle
data.comment: Caption on the open file dialog used to let the user browse the file system for the RTF editor they want PA to use when opening RTF files.

data.name: kstidSFMEditorCaptionOFD
data.comment: Caption for common dialog used to specify the SFM data source editor.

data.name: kstidSFMMappingGridInterlinear
data.comment: Column heading for interlinear column

data.name: kstidSFMMappingGridPaField
data.comment: Column heading for DB field column in the import mappings grid

data.name: kstidSFMMappingMissingError
data.value: You must specify a marker for the field '{0}'.
data.comment: This message is used when verifying SFM import mappings

data.name: kstidSFMMappingsGridMarker
data.comment: Column heading for marker column in the import mappings grid

data.name: kstidSFMMissingRecMarkerMapping
data.value: You must specify a marker for the 'Record Marker' in order for {0} to identify the beginning of each record.
data.comment: Message displayed when the record marker hasn't been mapped to an SF marker.

data.name: kstidSFMNoFirstInterlinearField
data.value: You must specify what is each record's first interlinear field.
data.comment: Message displayed when some interlinear fields have been specified but not the first interlinear field.

data.name: kstidSFMNoFirstInterlinearFieldItem
data.comment: First item in the list of potential first interlinear fields on the mappings dialog

data.name: kstidSFMNomappingForInterlinearField
data.value: The following field(s) have been specified as interlinear fields but need to be mapped to markers. {0}{1}
data.comment: The parameters are where line breaks are inserted.

data.name: kstidSFMNoMappingsSpecified
data.value: You must specify at least one field mapping other than one for the 'Record Marker'.
data.comment: Message displayed when the user hasn't specified any SFM mappings

data.name: kstidSFMUnecessaryFirstInterlinearField
data.value: Because you have specified the first interlinear field, you must also specify at least one other interlinear field from those that are mapped.

data.name: kstidUndefPhoneticCharsGridGroupHdgCountFmtLong
data.comment: Format string for buiding the group heading text for the grid in the undefined phonetic characters dialog. The first parameter is the character and the second is the unicode value.

data.name: kstidUndefPhoneticCharsGridGroupHdgCountFmtMed
data.comment: Format string for buiding the group heading text for the grid in the undefined phonetic characters dialog. The first parameter is the character and the second is the unicode value.

data.name: kstidUndefPhoneticCharsGridGroupHdgCountFmtShort
data.comment: Format string for buiding the group heading text for the grid in the undefined phonetic characters dialog. The first parameter is the character and the second is the unicode value.

data.name: kstidUndefPhoneticCharsGridGroupHdgFmt
data.comment: Format string for buiding the group heading text for the grid in the undefined phonetic characters dialog. The first parameter is the character and the second is the unicode value.

data.name: kstidUndefPhoneticChartsGridCodePointColFmt
data.comment: Format for displaying a character's codepoint value in the undefined phonetic characters dialog

data.comment: Heading for column in undefined phonetic chars. dialog

data.comment: Heading for column in undefined phonetic chars. dialog

data.comment: Text on the button in the XSLT column in the project settings dialog

data.name: kstidXSLTColButtonToolTip
data.comment: Tooltip for the button in the XSLTe column in the project settings dialog

data.name: kstidAddSearchCategoryBeforeSave
data.value: Before saving a search pattern, you must first add a category to the saved pattern list.

data.name: kstidCellInfoLnkCmdExperimentalTransText
data.comment: Text for command link on the experimental transcription items cell popup

data.name: kstidCellInfoLnkCmdUncertainText
data.comment: Text for command link on the uncertainty possibilities cell popup

data.name: kstidCharPickerTooltipLong
data.comment: Used to format the tooltip string for items in an IPA character picker control (1st argument is the character name, and the 2rd argument is for the description)

data.name: kstidCharPickerTooltipShort
data.comment: Used to format the tooltip string for items in an IPA character picker control when the character has no description (argument is the character name).

data.name: kstidClassListMembersToolTipAndHdg
data.comment: Heading for the tooltip used to display the members of a class of AND'd features in a class list view.

data.name: kstidClassListMembersToolTipOrHdg
data.comment: Heading for the tooltip used to display the members of a class of OR'd features in a class list view.

data.name: kstidClassListPhoneMembersToolTipHdg
data.comment: Heading for the tooltip used to display the members of a class of phones in a class list view.

data.name: kstidClassListSingleMemberToolTipHdg
data.comment: Heading for the tooltip used to display the member of a class containing a single feature.

data.name: kstidDefaultNewCustomFeatureName
data.comment: Default name given to new custom features when the user clicks add on the Define Articulatory dialog box.

data.name: kstidDefineClassDupClassName
data.value: Class '{0}' already exists. Choose a different name.
data.comment: Error msg for creating class with duplicate name

data.name: kstidDeleteFFCategoryConfirmationMsg
data.value: Are you sure you want to remove the search category '{0}'?
data.comment: Question asked when user wants to delete a find phone category in the find phone window.

data.name: kstidDeleteFFPatternConfirmationMsg
data.value: Are you sure you want to remove the search pattern '{0}'?
data.comment: Question asked when the user wants to delete a find phone search pattern.

data.name: kstidDockToolTip
data.comment: Tooktip for the sliding panel dock button

data.name: kstidDuplicateSearchCategoryMsg
data.value: There is already a category named '{0}'.

data.name: kstidDuplicateSearchQueryMsg
data.value: There is already a saved search pattern named '{0}' in the same category.

data.name: kstidDuplicateSearchQueryQuestion
data.value: There is already a saved search pattern named '{0}' in the same category. Would you like it overwritten?

data.name: kstidEmptySearchPatternText
data.comment: Text shown in empty search patterns in the Find Phone window

data.name: kstidEmptySearchPatternToolTip
data.value: Double-click, press enter on, or drag{0}to insert a class or IPA characters{1}to the current search pattern
data.comment: Tooltip text for empty search patterns in Find Phone window. The parameters are where there will be line breaks. If the localized version does not require line breaks, omit the parameters in the localization

data.name: kstidEmtpyRawRecView
data.comment: What's displayed in the record view when there is no data.

data.name: kstidEmtpyTabInfoText
data.value: Define a search pattern above and click Show Results.

data.name: kstidFindDataNotFound
data.value: The following specified text was not found:
data.comment: Message shown when all data has been searched without one match.

data.name: kstidFindDoneSearching
data.comment: Popup message when all records have been searched with the FindDlg

data.name: kstidGroupByNoneFieldName
data.comment: The item in the group by fields menu (and toolbar menu) indicating no field is being grouped on.

data.name: kstidHTMLExportFileMissingMsg
data.value: The file {0} is missing. Exporting cannot be completed.

data.name: kstidIngoreTieBarToolTip
data.value:
Ignoring tie-bars is somewhat different from ignoring other
symbols since tie-bars are not phone modifiers. Normally
the searching process considers a tie-bar and whatever it
joins to be a single phone. However, when ignoring tie-bars,
the single phone created by the tie-bar will be recognized
as two, unique phones.
data.comment: Tooltip used displayed when hovering over the ignore tie bars check box on the search view's options drop-down list.

data.name: kstidMyNetworkPlaces
data.comment: Used in the dialog for choosing an FW database

data.name: kstidNewClassName
data.comment: Default name given to new classes

data.name: kstidNewSavedPatternCategoryName
data.comment: This is the default name given to new categories in the saved search pattern tree in the find phone window

data.name: kstidNoMinimalPairsMsg
data.value: No minimal pairs to display.\nChange the minimal pairs options and try again.
data.comment: Shows in place of a word list grid when the user has turned on minimal pairs and there aren't any to show.

data.name: kstidNoMinimalPairsPopupMsg
data.comment: The user should never really see this message. :o)

data.name: kstidNoSavedSearchPatternsMsg
data.comment: Message shown in the saved search pattern list when there are on saved patterns.

data.name: kstidNoSearchResultsFoundMsg
data.comment: Displayed in the search results area when no matches were found.

data.name: kstidRemoveFeatureMsg
data.value: Are you sure you want to remove the feature '{0}'?
data.comment: Question asked when the user clicks on the remove button on the Define Articulatory Features dialog box.

data.name: kstidRTFExportCaptionSFD
data.comment: Save file dialog caption for specifying the rtf file exported to under RTF export

data.name: kstidRtfGridAllWordsLabel
data.comment: The value for the 'Word List' label when the exported list is not filtered or the result of a search query.

data.name: kstidRtfGridHdrDateTimeName
data.comment: The heading output for Date/Time name when exporting word lists to rtf. 1st param is a rtf tab; 2nd param is the Date/Time name.

data.name: kstidRtfGridHdrGroupField
data.comment: The heading output for the grouped on field when exporting find phone results to rtf. 1st param is a rtf tab; 2nd param is the search pattern.

data.name: kstidRtfGridHdrLanguageName
data.comment: The heading output for Language name when exporting word lists to rtf. 1st param is a rtf tab; 2nd param is the language name.

data.name: kstidRtfGridHdrNbrOfRecords
data.comment: The heading output for Number of Records when exporting word lists & find phone results to rtf. 1st param is a rtf tab; 2nd param is the number or records.

data.name: kstidRtfGridHdrProjectName
data.comment: The heading output for Project name when exporting word lists to rtf. 1st param is a rtf tab; 2nd param is the project name.

data.name: kstidRtfGridHdrSearchPattern
data.comment: The heading output for the Search Query when exporting find phone results to rtf. 1st param is a rtf tab; 2nd param is the search pattern.

data.name: kstidRtfGridHdrSearchPatternForMinPairs
data.comment: The heading output for the Search Query when exporting find phone results to rtf. 1st param is a rtf tab; 2nd param is the search pattern.

data.name: kstidRtfGridHdrWordListName
data.comment: The heading output for Word List name when exporting word lists to rtf. 1st param is a rtf tab; 2nd param is the Word List name.

data.name: kstidRtfOpenError1
data.comment: First argument is rtf file; second argument is error message.

data.name: kstidRtfOpenError2
data.comment: First argument is rtf file; second argument is the editor; third argument is error message.

data.name: kstidSearchResultHTMLFileName
data.comment: First parameter is language name, second is query name

data.name: kstidSearchResultTabToolTip
data.comment: Tooltip displayed when hovering over a search result tab in the search window.

data.name: kstidSrchPatternOneOrMoreError
data.value: Misplaced one-or-more symbol (+). The one-or-more symbol may only be at the beginning of the preceding environment and/or at the end of the following environment.
data.comment: Error displayed in XY Chart popup when a cell contains an error.

data.name: kstidSrchPatternWordBoundaryError
data.value: Misplaced space or word boundary symbol (#). A space or word boundary symbol may not be at the beginning or end of the search item.
data.comment: Error displayed in XY Chart popup when a cell contains an error.

data.name: kstidSrchPatternZeroOrMoreError
data.value: Misplaced zero-or-more symbol (*). The zero-or-more symbol may only be at the beginning of the preceding environment and/or at the end of the following environment.
data.comment: Error displayed in XY Chart popup when a cell contains an error.

data.name: kstidUndockedViewCaption
data.comment: Parameter one is the project name; parameter 2 is the view name; parameter 3 is the application name.

data.name: kstidWordListCellValueError
data.comment: Displayed in a word list cell when there was an error retrieving data for the cell. This should never be used, but just in case...

data.name: kstidXYChartAddEnvCellToolTip
data.value: Add a search environment\nin this cell

data.name: kstidXYChartAddSrchItemCellToolTip
data.value: Add a search item in this cell

data.name: kstidXYChartPopupInfoBadCharsMsg
data.value: This search pattern contains the following\nundefined phonetic character(s).

data.name: kstidXYChartPopupInfoErrListFormat
data.comment: The first argument is a number, the second is the error message. This is the format of the list of errors that may exist for a cell in an XY Chart when the cell contains a white X on a red circle.

data.name: kstidXYChartPopupInfoInvalidPhonesMsg
data.value: This search pattern contains the\nfollowing phone(s) not found in\ndata sources in the open project.

data.name: kstidXYChartPopupInfoSyntaxErrorsMsg
data.value: This search pattern contains\nthe following error(s):

data.name: kstidXYChartPopupInvalidCharFmt
data.comment: Format string for displaying undefined characters in a pattern in an XY chart cell popup.

data.name: kstidAutoHideToolTip
data.comment: Tooltip for the sliding panel auto. hide button
